```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 300
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Simple ShinyLive App"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderInput("num", "Choose a number:", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      textOutput("selected")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$selected <- renderText({
    paste("You selected:", input$num)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
